name: @aws-lambda/mds-policy
description: AWS Lambda for MDS Policy API

scripts.lambda:develop-mds-policy: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-2 --function-name develop-mds-policy --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-policy.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-prod-mds-policy: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-prod-mds-policy --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-policy.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-sandbox-mds-policy: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-sandbox-mds-policy --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-policy.zip

author: City of Los Angeles
